    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(MarkingMenuItem item)
        Method used to add item to the first level menu. Make the menu redraw.
        Parameters:
        item -

      • initMarkingMenu

        private void initMarkingMenu()
        Method used to initializing the menu. Instantiates objects and gets the screen size.

      • initPaints

        private void initPaints()
        Method used to set up all the painters.

      • onDraw

        protected void onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Overriding method used to draw the widget graphics. Switches on the mode and calls the right drawing method.
        Overrides:
        onDraw in class android.view.View

      • onDrawExpert

        private void onDrawExpert()
        Method used to draw in expert mode. It will draw a curve following the finger.

      • onDrawNovice

        private void onDrawNovice()
        Method used to draw in novice mode. It will set the menu location at the very first touch point, set the bounding box for the menu and draw the menu.

      • setMenuLocation

        private void setMenuLocation(float x,
                   float y)
        Method used to set the menu location. If it is supposed to be drawn out of the screen, it will set the location to the border.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Overriding method used to catch touch events like Action.DOWN, Action.MOVE or Action.UP. It will determine in which mode we are and update the visual feedback.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class android.view.View

      • initLevel

        private void initLevel()
        Method used to set up the indexes of the items.

      • releaseMenu

        private void releaseMenu()
        Method used to know if the menu has been released on a leaf item, if so throwing the corresponding event.

      • analyseDrawing

        private void analyseDrawing()
        Method used to analyze the drawn scheme in order to select the right item reached.

      • decryptPattern

        private void decryptPattern()
        Method used to decrypt the drawn scheme, it will browse items to know where the final selected item is.

      • computeMove

        private void computeMove()
        Method used to know where we are when a Action.MOVE event has been triggered.
